<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the running CRC-32 of Data, with CRC being the previous value of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// checksum.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlight">uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9b39f29a121496d294af31158c65740b">crc32</a>(uint32&#95;t CRC, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Class for computing the JamCRC.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We will use the &quot;Rocksoft^tm Model CRC Algorithm&quot; to describe the properties</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of this CRC:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Width  : 32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Poly   : 04C11DB7</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Init   : FFFFFFFF</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   RefIn  : True</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   RefOut : True</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   XorOut : 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Check  : 340BC6D9 (result of CRC for &quot;123456789&quot;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In other words, this is the same as CRC-32, except that XorOut is 0 instead</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of FFFFFFFF.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// N.B.  We permit flexibility of the &quot;Init&quot; value.  Some consumers of this need</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       it to be zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jamcrc"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jamcrc/#abfdc2599e8f94e4ca9d49f6b7d2a54ec">JamCRC</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
